long_description: Made of soft, lightweight fabric, the lucy Motivate Me Jacket for women offers a soft touch for yoga and any activity where comfort is key. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking fabric keeps you comfortable during activity. Raglan sleeves increase freedom of motion. Thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over top of wrists for extra warmth. Hood features light shirring for a fun look. The lucy Motivate Me Jacket for women offers offers a relaxed fit.
short_description: Made of soft, lightweight fabric, the lucy Motivate Me Jacket for women offers a soft touch for yoga and any activity where comfort is key.
